alert.note: Alert for Clay; Dickinson; Geary; Ottawa; Riley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 11:23PM CDT until June 08 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN DICKINSON...NORTHWESTERN GEARY...SOUTHWESTERN RILEY... SOUTHERN OTTAWA...WEST CENTRAL POTTAWATOMIE AND SOUTHERN CLAY COUNTIES... At 1123 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles east of Olsburg to 3 miles northwest of Milford Lake to 3 miles northeast of Culver, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Minneapolis, Westmoreland, Solomon, Wakefield, Riley, Bennington, Milford, Tescott, Culver, Wells, Manchester, Longford, Niles, Talmage, Milford Lake, Moonlight, Keats and Tuttle Creek Lake. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 267 and 277. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
